name: Summer Vacation Hidden Object Game
description:
🏄 It's vacation time! Let every day be your summer holiday with the best seek and find game! Download Summer Vacation Hidden Object Game with multiple levels for free and feel relaxed, happy and satisfied while playing your new favorite game 2019. Your summertime adventure saga can begin, no matter what season of the year is outside. Take a sip of your favorite cocktail and imagine you are on the beach, far away from everyday troubles. Help Fred pack his things and get ready for the trip to Hawaii. Spot hidden objects in pictures and find missing items from his list get ready for everlasting summer to begin!

🌞 Summer Vacation Hidden Object Game features: 🌞

🔍 Summer adventure game free localized into 15 languages!
🌅 More than 1000 hidden objects to find in a holiday resort!
🔍 Multiple levels with mystery places full of hidden objects!
🌅 Beautiful 3D game design that will leave you speechless!
🔍 Fantastic animations that make this seek & find game unique!
🌅 Beautiful music and sound effects for an amazing experience!
🔍 Find the hidden figure from the card below and click on it!
🌅 Click on the magnifying glass button to use help when you're stuck!
🔍 For mobile phones only! - Zoom in the picture to find the objects!
🌅 Move the picture when it is zoomed to find the hidden objects!
🔍 Zoom out at any moment to see the mystery scene again!

🚢 Additional mystery hidden object game features: 🚢

🔍 Picture search for finding missing objects quickly and easily!
🌅 Silhouette hidden object – a challenging level for finding items!
🔍 Word scramble game level – find hidden figures in anagrams!
🌅 Flashlight or a night mode level – use the light to find items!
🔍 Match Pairs – a new brain teaser memory game with cards!
🌅 Find the Difference – a summer games to spot the difference between pics!
🔍 Time limit game - bonus level to train your brain and concentration!
🌅 Puzzle game – put the puzzle pieces together to make a picture!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Webelinx.Hidden.Object.Games/
Follow us on VK: https://vk.com/igripoiskpredmetov

🏄 Let the summer holiday countdown begin and start with summer fun! Download Summer Vacation Hidden Object Game full version 2019 and find hidden objects in pictures and pass the levels to follow Fred to the final destination. Get on the cruiser and enjoy traveling to a tropical island - play puzzle hidden object game adventure to train your brain and have fun at the same time. Summer in the city is not so interesting, but with this fabulous seek and find hidden object game, suddenly everything can be interesting and amazing. Kill your boredom by searching for hidden items and be a part of the best summer time adventure for free.

Best summer vacation games for girls with levels!

🏄 Find thousands of hidden objects, solve tons of mini-games and puzzles! You will be amazed how good you feel every time you start playing this fabulous mystery island game with missing objects. From the very moment you start playing Summer Vacation Hidden Object Game 2019, you will dive into an unforgettable adventure that will take you far away to the tropical islands. This is the best big city escape game and a fantastic boredom killer game for boys and girls, men and women you have to try.

Fantastic summer holiday games 2019! Seek and find hidden objects and have fun!

🏄 Summer Vacation Hidden Object Game will certainly warm you up during the cold winter days! If you cannot wait for summer to come, bring summer into your life with the best summertime adventure game free download. This object finding game is here for you to make you feel relaxed like you are on a vacation and test your concentration at the same time. So don't hesitate, take your sunblock, sunglasses and find missing objects and hidden figures and let the sunshine in your life!
